DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect freeze dry strawberry powder LDL cholesterol , central peripheral blood pressure , indices arterial stiffness , lipid lipoprotein concentration . The investigator hypothesize bioactive compound freeze dry strawberry powder may elicit beneficial effect LDL cholesterol , well blood pressure arterial health .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Freeze Dried Strawberry Powder Supplementation Vascular Function Blood Markers Cardiovascular Risk
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study design 3-period randomize crossover dose-response study evaluate effect freeze dry strawberry powder supplementation LDL-C vascular health . Research participant overweight obese ( BMI 25-39 kg/m^2 ) otherwise healthy adult moderately elevate LDL-C ( > 116 mg/dL > 3.0mmol/L ) , blood pressure < 160/100 mmHg , total cholesterol 240 mg/dL , triglycerides 350 mg/dL . Subjects randomly assign three supplementation period : 1 ) low dose freeze dry strawberry powder ( 13 g/d ) ; 2 ) high dose freeze dry strawberry powder ( 40 g/d ) ; 3 ) placebo powder . Each powder provide 4-6 week , separate 2-week washout period treatment period . Baseline endpoint test include blood collection vascular testing .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman 3565 year age 2 . BMI ≥ 25 ≤ 39 kg/m^2 3 . LDLC > 116 mg/dL 4 . Total Cholesterol 240 mg/dL 5 . Triglycerides 350 mg/d 6 . Nonsmokers 7 . Blood pressure < 160/100 mmHg 1 . History acute chronic inflammatory condition heart disease , kidney disease , liver disease , autoimmune disorder , thyroid disease ( unless control medication blood result within previous 6 month provide ) 2 . History diabetes mellitus ( and/or fast glucose > 126 mg/dL screen ) 3 . Stage II hypertension ( blood pressure ≥ 160/100 mmHg ) 4 . Lactation , pregnancy , desire become pregnant study 5 . Unwillingness discontinue nutritional supplement , herb , vitamin , unless approve investigator 6 . Use medications/supplements elevated lipid , blood pressure , glucose 7 . Chronic use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory immunosuppressant medication 8 . Conditions require use steroid 9 . Unwillingness refrain blood donation prior study 10 . Any medical condition abnormal laboratory value judge clinically significant investigator 11 . Allergy sensitivity strawberry ingredient study powder
